### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 80
- Low Temperature (°F): 63
- Precipitation (inches): 0.45
- Wind Speed (mph): 15
- Conditions: Thunderstorms PM

### Field Notes
- All probes reading within calibration tolerances
- Stream bank stable at all monitoring points
- Cr at WQ-03: 118 ug/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (118 ug/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 ug/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (74.3 ug/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Hexavalent chromium speciation analysis ordered for WQ-03

### Events
- Weekly grab samples collected all stations per SOP-12
- WQ-03 multiparameter sonde serviced
- Recreational use advisory board meeting scheduled

### Notes
- Day 24 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 118 ug/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.
